remarks: Version of ~ fsumcn for two-argument mappings.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-May-2014.)
statement:
fsumcn.3 $e |- K = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) $.
fsumcn.4 $e |- ( ph -> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) $.
fsumcn.5 $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fsum2cn.7 $e |- ( ph -> L e. ( TopOn ` Y ) ) $.
fsum2cn.8 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> ( x e. X , y e. Y |-> B ) e. ( ( J tX L ) Cn K ) ) $.
fsum2cn $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. X , y e. Y |-> sum_ k e. A B ) e. ( ( J tX L ) Cn K ) ) $.
$d A k x y $.
$d J k x y $.
$d K k x y $.
$d L k $.
$d X k x y $.
$d Y k x y $.
$d k ph x y $.
